articles.content: Artists including PJ Harvey, Nick Cave, and Johnny Marr have signed a letter from the Creative Industries Federation (CIF) urging the UK government to release funds to support the creative industries. The letter, addressed to the chancellor and culture secret… [+1049 chars]
